changelogversion.changelogtext: [[b][font color=red]GoogleCast[/font][/b]] Supports more subtitles and more streams.
[[b][font color=red]Bugs[/font][/b]] Fixed crashing on Android 14, can't delete trakt list on firestick and tv-box
[[b][font color=yellow]Streams[/font][/b]] Fixed issues with some providers and resolvers.

[[b][font color=yellow]Subtitle[/font][/b]] Filter subtitle providers for each supported player (for example, subtitle providers offering URLs with zip files for external players will not appear in the subtitle dialog result)
[[b][font color=red]Bugs[/font][/b]] Apply some optimized code for the gray/black/freeze screen issue on Android TV.
[[b][font color=yellow]Hot-fix[/font][/b]] Fixed issue where the stream link couldn't be changed when playing with subtitles.

[[b][font color=yellow]Player[/font][/b]] Improved built-in player UI. Updated CSPlayer to 1.0.6 with support for multiple formats, auto play all episodes from the season pack (Long click season to load season pack with RD/AD/PM account).

[[b][font color=yellow]Trakt[/font][/b]] Updated the delete Trakt list option. It will now delete the list from both local storage and Trakt. Fixed bug: tvShow backdrop not showing when switch to Trakt source.
[[b][font color=yellow]UI/UX[/font][/b]] Saved the latest state of Favorites and History. Legacy file picker used for Android TV.
[[b][font color=yellow]Streams[/font][/b]] Fixed missing links in some movies and TV shows, Fixed some providers and resolvers.
Fixed bug: Screen saver turns on during Built-In Player playback.
Improved focus navigation on the Favorites page.
Fixed intermittent issue with the play function not working.
Limited the request for storage permission to when it is needed.
Fixed and added many providers and resolvers.
